form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Lee (for himself, Mr. Vitter, Mr. Cotton, Mr. Enzi, Mr. Sessions, and Mr. Rubio) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To protect communities from destructive Federal overreach by the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Local Zoning Decisions Protection Act of 2015.

section.header: Prohibition on use of Federal funds

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the final rule of the Department of Housing and Urban Development entitled Affirmatively Furthering Fair Housing (80 Fed. Reg. 42272 (July 16, 2015)).

Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be used to design, build, maintain, utilize, or provide access to a Federal database of geospatial information on community racial disparities or disparities in access to affordable housing.
